Package net.sim

Class Device

java.lang.Object
net.sim.Device
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
Computer, Router, Switch, WirelessRouter
public abstract class Device extends Object implements EventHandler
This class is responsible for defining the behaviors of all devices
Author:
Nikita Druzhkov
